meanings.definition: A slender, elongated, soft-bodied larva of a click beetle.
meanings.sent1: The wireworm wriggled through the soil in search of food.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use traps to catch wireworms that harm crops.
meanings.sent3: The wireworm decided to take a nap in the cozy earth.
meanings.sent4: The wireworm's journey through the ground was like a silent dance.
meanings.sent5: Children learn about wireworms in science class to understand their role in nature.

meanings.definition: A type of pest that feeds on the roots and stems of plants.
meanings.sent1: Gardeners struggle to protect their plants from the destructive wireworm.
meanings.sent2: The wireworms caused damage to the delicate roots of the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The wireworms threw a tiny party in the vegetable patch, munching on roots.
meanings.sent4: The wireworms invaded the garden like tiny, hungry invaders.
meanings.sent5: The farmer battled the wireworms to save his precious crops from harm.
